title: Baby Carrier
description: top section, 19-1/4\" x 21-1/2\", bordered on three sides by white; rows of applique and embroidery enclose a 7-3/4\" x 5-1/2\" center applique with tiny embroidered squares in green and red; bottom recatngle, 13-1/2\" x 22-1/4\", bordered in dark green; center is signle piece embroidered with vertical and horizontal rows of chevrons in red, purple, green; distinctive embroidered corners suggest mitered corners; blue lining
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
